error.message: Class Behat\Mink\WebAssert not found and could not be autoloaded.
Class Behat\Mink\WebAssert not found and could not be autoloaded.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to loyalist.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
